# calculate isoforest score from df

calculate isoforest score from df

## Usage

``` r
score_isoforest(df)
```

## Arguments

- df:

  database

## Value

vector

## Examples

``` r
score_isoforest(iris[sapply(iris, is.numeric)])
#>         1         2         3         4         5         6         7         8
```
